basic_info.description: I am Juan Camilo Peña Marín, a software developer. I currently live in Colombia, I have worked with Python, Java, kotlin, html, php, sql, laravel, databases, react and different languages ​​and tools with the ability to create innovative solutions in both the web and mobile spheres.

projects.title: VPN with Wireguard
projects.description: Discover how to create a VPN that allows secure connections to a private network through a server in AWS, using the Docker image for deployment. This free solution ensures data protection and communications integrity in both public and private environments.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
